message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While that price doesn't quite work for me, I could be flexible if we can find a middle ground. Would you be willing to consider $12,500?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget at $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?
